extra.enrollment_requirement:
Corequisite    GEOL104 or permission of the Department.
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from GEOL212; GEOL232.

basic.description: An introduction to the crystallography and crystal chemistry of rock-forming minerals for students not in the Geological Sciences. The structural, chemical and genetic aspects of the crystalline state as displayed by minerals are considered.
basic.subject: GEOE
basic.title: Introduction To Minerology
